short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply reminders on to sites to give information about deployment windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you often have to deploy code during certain hours of the day? Have many projects with different times to deploy? Then the deployment window extension is for you!

Deployment windows has the ability to add notices onto websites reminding you when you can and cannot deploy code.

This project is open source, more information about how it works can be found on Github: https://github.com/elistone/chrome-deployment-windows
